publications

Publications by categories in reversed chronological order.

2018

  1. A Query Engine for Probabilistic Preferences Cohen, Uzi, Kenig, Batya, Ping, Haoyue, Kimelfeld, Benny, and Stoyanovich, Julia In Proceedings of the 2018 International Conference on Management of Data, SIGMOD Conference 2018, Houston, TX, USA, June 10-15, 2018 2018
  2. Probabilistic Inference Over Repeated Insertion Models Kenig, Batya, Ilijasic, Lovro, Ping, Haoyue, Kimelfeld, Benny, and Stoyanovich, Julia In Proceedings of the Thirty-Second AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence, New Orleans, Louisiana, USA, February 2-7, 2018 2018

2017

  1. A Database Framework for Probabilistic Preferences Kenig, Batya, Kimelfeld, Benny, Ping, Haoyue, and Stoyanovich, Julia In Proceedings of the 11th Alberto Mendelzon International Workshop on Foundations of Data Management and the Web, Montevideo, Uruguay, June 7-9, 2017. 2017
  2. Querying Probabilistic Preferences in Databases Kenig, Batya, Kimelfeld, Benny, Ping, Haoyue, and Stoyanovich, Julia In Proceedings of the 36th ACM SIGMOD-SIGACT-SIGAI Symposium on Principles of Database Systems, PODS 2017, Chicago, IL, USA, May 14-19, 2017 2017
  3. DataSynthesizer: Privacy-Preserving Synthetic Datasets Ping, Haoyue, Stoyanovich, Julia, and Howe, Bill In Proceedings of the 29th International Conference on Scientific and Statistical Database Management, Chicago, IL, USA, June 27-29, 2017 2017
  4. Synthetic Data for Social Good Howe, Bill, Stoyanovich, Julia, Ping, Haoyue, Herman, Bernease, and Gee, Matt CoRR 2017

2016

  1. Workload-driven learning of mallows mixtures with pairwise preference data Stoyanovich, Julia, Ilijasic, Lovro, and Ping, Haoyue In Proceedings of the 19th International Workshop on Web and Databases, San Francisco, CA, USA, June 26, 2016 2016
